DOC.brief_summary: A ) For investigation Visual acuity , inter-test agreement test-retest reliability use three different visual acuity test : ETDRS chart , Landoltring chart Freiburg Visual Acuity Test ( FrACt ) . The examinee pass visual acuity test twice sequence visual acuity test randomize different examinee . The examinee 24 adult Aalen university student ( except student ophthalmic optic term 2 - 7 ) minimal distant visual acuity without correction 0.2 . Another inclusion criterion maximum myopia sph -2,00 dpt , maximum hyperopia sph +5,50 dpt maximum astigmatism cyl 2,50 dpt . The Landolt C project eight-orientations . For FrACT Test use two different device response input : modify keypad Landoltring symbol ( FrACTk ) haptic Landolt device adjustable Landoltring ( FrACTh ) . The primary objective comparison FrACTk FrACTh . The secondary Objective contains comparison visual acuity test . B ) Background : Landolt Cs letter commonly use optotypes . In explorative study compare four different way apply : The Freiburg visual acuity test ( FrACT ) use keypad haptic Landolt device , Landolt C chart accordance ISO 8596 DIN 58220 eight-orientated Landolt C ETDRS chart . The aim survey determine examinee´s/examiner´s subjective rating use Visual analogue scale ( VAS ) , inter-test agreement test test-retest reliability test , concern test duration . Subjects Methods : Twenty-four adult examinee visual acuity ≥ 0,2 include explorative study . The visual acuity one eye measure monocularly , randomize regard leading/non-leading eye . The subject pass every visual acuity test twice randomize sequence visual acuity test , maintain pre-specified randomization list , make use forced choice .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Freiburg Visual Acuity Test ( FrACT ) With EDTRS- Landoltring Charts
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . FrACT ( internet version 3.8.1 ) 1.1 haptic Landolt Ring device ( FrACTh ) 1.2 modify keypad Landolt Ring symbol ( FrACTk ) 2 . ETDRS Visual Acuity Tester ( Steinbeis Transferzentrum Biomedizinische Optik , Tübingen/Germany ) 3 . Landoltring chart ( Visus GmbH , Stuttgart/Germany ) 4 . VISUCAT monitor single optotype display ( number ; Argus Individuell Optic GmbG , Putzbrunn/Germany ) 5 . Room illuminance level 250 lx , assess digital luxmeter ( Peak Tech 5025 , Peak Tech Prüf - und Messtechnik GmbH , Ahrensburg/Germany ) 6 . Laptopdisplay ( TravelMate , Acer , 8372 Taipeh/China ) : luminance level 151 cd/m2 , surround luminance level 75 cd/m2 , assess luminance meter ( IS-110 Laptop Minolta , Tokyo/Japan ) 7 . ETDRS Visual Acuity Tester : luminance level : 237 cd/m² , surround luminance level 85 cd/m² 8 . Landoltring Chart : luminance level : 236 cd/m² , surround luminance level 84 cd/m² 9 . VISUCAT : luminance level : 380 cd/m² , surround luminance level 70 cd/m² 10 . Stopwatch ( Apple iPhone 4S , Cupertino CA/USA ) 11 . Laser Rangefinder ( GLM 80 Professional , Bosch GmbH , Stuttgart/Germany )
DOC.criteria: age ≥ 18 year Minimum distant visual acuity ( without/with correction ) 0.2 ( Visucat , single letter optotypes [ number ] , initial session ) . As long minimum distant visual acuity limit exceed , test run without optical correction prefer order enhance spectrum/variety test visual acuity value Ametropia : maximum myopia sph 2.00 dpt maximum hyperopia sph +5.50 dpt maximum astigmatism cyl 2.5 dpt inform consent Epilepsy / psychiatric disorder Drugs affect reaction time / determine visual acuity , refractive power eye Ophthalmic Education Amblyopia strabismus Glaucoma IOP > 22 mmHg Nystagmus Diabetic retinopathy ( blood sugarrelated retinal disease ) Very dry eye ( sicca symptom ) eye surgery back less 3 month Infectious disease ( conjunctivitis , corneal inflammation , choroidal inflammation ) miosis drug Pronounced eye injuries Other eye disorder affect image quality Macular diseases albinism
